body.p: Paragraph 80 of this Standard requires goodwill acquired in a business combination to be allocated to each of the acquirer’s cash‑generating units, or groups of cash‑generating units, expected to benefit from the synergies of the combination, irrespective of whether other assets or liabilities of the acquiree are assigned to those units, or groups of units. It is possible that some of the synergies resulting from a business combination will be allocated to a cash‑generating unit in which the non‑controlling interest does not have an interest.
